title: Identify Blocking Operations
description: Look at the code below and identify which operations are blocking (would benefit from async).
instructions: Add comments to identify which operations are blocking I/O operations that would benefit from async, and which are CPU-bound operations that would not.

hints.text: I/O operations involve waiting for external resources (files, network, database). CPU operations are pure computation.

commonMistakes.mistake: Thinking async speeds up all code
commonMistakes.consequence: No performance improvement for CPU-bound tasks
commonMistakes.correction: Async only helps when waiting for I/O operations
